name: DragonPrototype
description:
• Control a dragon with your mouse.
  • Try to gather as many gems on top of your dragon egg
  • The egg only incubates when its got gems
  • Avoid being shot by archers (you'll drop your gem)
  • Keep boats away from your egg (they shoot gems into the sea
  • Press escape to exit

A really buggy prototype built in about 5 hours over the las week, art done in 15mins after breakfast this morning... my apologies.

Bug List:

  • too many to count

Mac and Windows builds to follow, if anyone leaves a comment, proving that someone has actually seen this, same goes for bug fixes and updates.
